graph_title: Percentage of RITE buildings/facilities with an A, B or C energy efficiency certificate.
indicator_name: Percentage of RITE buildings/facilities with an A, B or C energy efficiency certificate.
SDG_GOAL: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
SDG_TARGET: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency
SDG_INDICATOR: Percentage of RITE buildings/facilities with an A, B or C energy efficiency certificate.
indicator_level: Process (offer information about the effort (resources, decisions, actions...) that the UPO is making to comply with the SDG)
